description: This source file provides React hooks (`useKeyboardInput` and `useSwipeInput`) to handle user input events (keyboard and touch swipe) for a 2048 game frontend. The hooks attach event listeners to the window object and invoke callbacks when directional inputs are detected.

methods.name: useKeyboardInput(onMove)
methods.description: Hook to listen for keyboard events (arrow keys and WASD) and call the provided onMove callback with the detected direction.

methods.name: useSwipeInput(onMove)
methods.description: Hook to detect basic swipe gestures on touch screens and invoke the onMove callback with the detected direction.
